name: mif14
description: Just a package.json to easly run some commands (just like a makefile).

scripts.dev: docker-compose up --detach datalog_project_terminal && docker attach $(docker-compose ps -q datalog_project_terminal)
scripts.tar: npm run clean && tar -czvf rendu.tar.gz Dockerfile docker-compose.yml README.md package.json requirements.txt src/ doc/

author: CECILLON Enzo
